name: Snow Stopper
description:
Protect your snowy village from an incoming physics-based avalanche!

⛰️ Examine the natural shape of the mountain valley
🚧 Strategically place barriers 
🏘️💖Stop the frosty forces to save the villages

The gameplay loop and multiple levels are sadly not finished yet. But I hope you have fun in this "snowbox" mode. 
Just spawn some avalanches yourself and try to stop them with barriers.

WEBGL NOTE: There is a rather long load time at the beginning of the game when played in browser, also camera movement seems to lag pretty hard. If you can please try the Windows/Linux build.

############

Controls

Place Structures - Left Click
Cancel Selection - Right Click / Esc
Rotate Structures - Mouse Wheel
Space - Spawns snow at cursor position
Change Simulation Speed - 1 / 2 / 3

Camera:

Look around - Hold Right Click
Move Camera - WASD QE
Camera Speed Boost - Hold Shift
Change Camera Speed - Right Click + Scroll Wheel
